message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $18,000, but I'm open to discussing a fair price.
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle at $15,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $15,000 is still a bit below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about we meet at $16,000? I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer of $12,000, so how about $13,500?

Bob, I appreciate you trying to work with me, but $13,500 is simply too low for me to consider.  I'm willing to come down a bit further,  but $15,000 is my absolute bottom line.  Let's not waste more time, I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're willing to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle from my previous offer of $13,500, so how about $14,250?
